title: [GAMEPLAY] soraka heals does not work well on aram
body:
Twice i had soraka in ARAM, twice my heal does not change with or without rabadon. The additionnal heal (0.something of AP) does not count when i do my W.
Soraka becomes useless in the late game.
To repeat the bug : 
1. Manage to get Soraka in ARAM.
2. Build AP
3. See that there is no difference ( i do 246 actual healing whereas it's written 240(+238)).

I love that champ', so please i would like to keep it in aram when i have it.
Thanks a lot

replies.body:
Healing allies is 50% effective in ARAM. 

246 is actually a bit more than 50% of 240+238, so if there was a bug it would that you are healing *too much*.
Yup! That's correct - healing effects are reduced on ARAM.
You dont build AP on Aram, you go tanky ap, get a warmogs and reach 3000 health, then laugh at their faces when they cant kill anyone on your team!!!
